smartblocks.shapes
Interface Shape

All Known Implementing Classes:
Box, Circle, Polygon
public interface Shape

An interface representing the geometric shape of a simulation object or block

Author:
David FUENMAYOR

getCentroid

Vector2D getCentroid(boolean absolute)
Gets the coordinates of the centroid of this shape

Parameters:
absolute - If true, adds this.getBounds().offset to the return value
Returns:
X and Y coordinates of the centroid

getVertices

Vector2D[] getVertices(boolean absolute)
Gets an array with a copy of the vertices of this Shape

Parameters:
absolute - if true the vertices are rotated around the centroid and then translated according to the centroid's position
Returns:
Vector2D array with the vertices of this Shape copied
